article.title: College_of_the_City_of_New_York
article.paragraph: College of the City of New Yorkmay refer to:

list.listitem: City College of New York, the official name of the first college in the public university system of New York City
City University of New York, a senior college of City College of New York
New York City College of Technology, college commonly erroneously-named "College of the City of New York"
The former name ofNew York University's undergraduate college when the university was named "University of the City of New York"
